section.p: In RHEL/CentOS, Distributed Replicated Block Device (DRBD) is a kernel module. When 6.6.0 was released, the module available on the Enterprise Linux packages repository (ELRepo) was for Linux kernel 3.10.0-1127. You must ensure that the version of DRBD you install works with the kernel you are using on both master hosts. Also, note that DRBD 8.4 does not support RHEL 8.x.
